p: The Granite State Poll conducts telephone interviews with independent random samples of about 500 New Hampshire residents four times each year. Our core climate question has been carried on 21 surveys to date, from April 2010 through May 2015. Sampling and interviews for the GSP are done by the UNH Survey Center, with response rates averaging 25% (AAPOR 2006 definition 4). Probability weights (variable censuswt2) provide adjustments for minor design and sampling bias. The S3 Dataset attached contains the climate-change responses from all of the New Hampshire, CERA/CAFOR and other surveys described in this paper, a total of 28,962 individual interviews.
